summary: This testimony discusses our earlier findings on nonimmigrant visa applications as well as the Department of Homeland Security's predeparture programs . Among other things, we found: About 2.8 million nonimmigrant visa applications were refused in fiscal year 2017—over 90% of which were because the applicant didn't qualify for the visa 0.05% of applications were refused for security-related concerns 1,338 visa applications were refused because of...
title: Border Security: U.S. Government Efforts to Strengthen Nonimmigrant Visa Security and Address High-Risk Air Travelers
